# Minutes in a Week

> Number of minutes in a week.

<section class="usage">

## Usage

``` javascript
var MINUTES_IN_WEEK = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/minutes-in-week' );
```

#### MINUTES_IN_WEEK

Number of minutes in a week.

``` javascript
MINUTES_IN_WEEK === 10080;
```

</section>

<!-- /.usage -->

``` javascript
var MINUTES_IN_WEEK = require( '@stdlib/time/constants/minutes-in-week' );

console.log( MINUTES_IN_WEEK );
// => 10080
```
